resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request #12336:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12336


   It seems that ruby-gobject-introspection package was removed from
   Debian GNU/Linux bookwarm:
   
   https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/5062773703?check_suite_focus=true#step:10:1910
   
       + apt install -y -V --no-install-recommends ruby-gobject-introspection
   
       WARNING: apt does not have a stable CLI interface. Use with caution in scripts.
   
       Reading package lists...
       Building dependency tree...
       Reading state information...
       Package ruby-gobject-introspection is not available, but is referred to by another package.
       This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or
       is only available from another source
   
       E: Package 'ruby-gobject-introspection' has no installation candidate


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.

fields.description:
It seems that {{ruby-gobject-introspection}} package was removed from Debian GNU/Linux bookwarm:

https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/5062773703?check_suite_focus=true#step:10:1910

{noformat}
  + apt install -y -V --no-install-recommends ruby-gobject-introspection
  
  WARNING: apt does not have a stable CLI interface. Use with caution in scripts.
  
  Reading package lists...
  Building dependency tree...
  Reading state information...
  Package ruby-gobject-introspection is not available, but is referred to by another package.
  This may mean that the package is missing, has been obsoleted, or
  is only available from another source
  
  E: Package 'ruby-gobject-introspection' has no installation candidate
{noformat}
fields.summary: [Packaging][deb] Use gem instead of apt to install gobject-introspection gem
